name: Ginormo Sword
storyline: You are a warrior going on a quest to defeat the most dangerous and powerful monsters with your trusty sword. Collect gold which you will use to upgrade your sword and increase its size to an obscene scale. Let's see if you can make your sword the size of the screen!
summary: An idle parody flash RPG where you grind for gold to increase the size of your sword to giant proportions and destroy all the enemies on this silly adventure.
